page.title: 09Horse Rangers.
page.content: The Horse Rangers use 7 fields near to Fifield village,one for exercising the horses and the others for grazing.They ride only{on Saturdays and Sundays,} the Rangers between 9.00am and 12 noon and the junior members between 1.30pm and 4.00pm. Juniors must be 5 years old before they can join and you can become a Ranger when you are 10. It costs Â£6 a month. There are{2 horses and{9 ponies}which can be ridden under the supervision of{11 adult officers.} Each junior session has 4 groups with up to 11 children in each.Members wear a{uniform;}girls a green shirt, cream jodhpurs, a riding hat or bush hat and boys a beige shirt, jodhpurs, a riding hat or green beret. The Rangers attend 3{parades}in London every year and every 4 years a Royal visit is held usually at Hampton Court.They can earn {badges}as their riding ability grows.
